Text: Thank you very much to LittleBlueGirl.  This is an indispensable resource for serious readers of the Bible -- an edition of the New Testament that addresses its Jewish background and the culture from which it grew.
Best ebook download I've seen in a LONG time. Thanks!

See also Marc Zvi Brettler, How to Read the Bible (Jewish Publication Society, 2005):

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8467285/
